page.title: 18BIDSTON GOLF CLUB
page.content: We have 2 golf clubs in our area, Leasowe and Bidston.I visited Bidston and interviewed the greenkeeper. Bidston Golf course is 72 years old, but the Club House is modern being only 4 years old.Mr.J.Law is the manager and employs 10 people to run the club.The club has approximately 400 members and there is a junior section for 11-18 year olds. Annual fees are Â£207,and visitors are most welcome although prior booking is best at weekends.Sunday is busiest. Course Details: {Length:6207 yds. Par:71 The 16th. hole is an interesting Par 3 (and is named after a song by Donald Peers!) Mr.P.Whitehouse holds the record score for the course with 67 gross (64 nett) {(Kerry Wright)
